Package com.safetynet.safetynet_alert.controller

Class FireStationController

java.lang.Object
com.safetynet.safetynet_alert.controller.FireStationController
@RestController public class FireStationController extends Object
Controller for managing fire station-related endpoints.

      Constructor to initialize FireStationController with FireStationService.

  • Method Details

    • createFireStation

      @PostMapping("/firestation") @ResponseStatus(CREATED) public void createFireStation(@RequestBody FireStation fireStation)
      Creates a new fire station.
      Parameters:
      fireStation - The fire station to be created.

    • updateFireStation

      @PutMapping("/firestation") @ResponseStatus(OK) public void updateFireStation(@RequestBody FireStation fireStation)
      Updates an existing fire station.
      Parameters:
      fireStation - The fire station with updated information.

    • deleteFireStation

      @DeleteMapping("/firestation") @ResponseStatus(OK) public void deleteFireStation(@RequestParam(required=false) Integer stationNumber, @RequestParam(required=false) String address)
      Deletes a fire station based on station number or address.
      Parameters:
      stationNumber - The station number to delete (optional).
      address - The address of the fire station to delete (optional).

    • getPersonsByStation

      @GetMapping("/firestation") public FireStationResponse getPersonsByStation(@RequestParam int stationNumber) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.exc.StreamReadException, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DatabindException, IOException
      Retrieves persons covered by a specific fire station.
      Parameters:
      stationNumber - The fire station number.
      Returns:
      A FireStationResponse object containing relevant data.
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.exc.StreamReadException - If an error occurs while reading the stream.
      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DatabindException - If an error occurs while binding data.
      IOException - If an I/O exception occurs.

    • getPhoneNumbersByStation

      @GetMapping("/phoneAlert") public Set<String> getPhoneNumbersByStation(@RequestParam int stationNumber)
      Retrieves phone numbers of residents covered by a fire station.
      Parameters:
      stationNumber - The fire station number.
      Returns:
      A set of phone numbers.

    • getChildrenByAddress

      @GetMapping("/childAlert") public ChildAlertResponse getChildrenByAddress(@RequestParam String address)
      Retrieves children living at a specific address.
      Parameters:
      address - The address to search for children.
      Returns:
      A ChildAlertResponse containing children and family details.

    • getPersonsByAddress

      @GetMapping("/fire") public FireResponse getPersonsByAddress(@RequestParam String address)
      Retrieves persons living at a specific address in case of a fire.
      Parameters:
      address - The address to search.
      Returns:
      A FireResponse containing residents' information.

    • getHomesByStation

      @GetMapping("/flood") public List<FloodDTO> getHomesByStation(@RequestParam List<Integer> stationNumbers)
      Retrieves homes covered by multiple fire stations.
      Parameters:
      stationNumbers - A list of fire station numbers.
      Returns:
      A list of FloodDTO containing household details.
